channel.title: HB 1574 - Protecting access to life-saving care and substance use services.

item.title: First reading, referred to Community Safety.
item.description: First reading, referred to Community Safety.

item.title: 👍Caleb Banta-Green - University of Washington, School of Medicine, Addictions, Drug & Alcohol Institute (Professor)
item.description: Caleb Banta-Green signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent University of Washington, School of Medicine, Addictions, Drug & Alcohol Institute (Professor).
